entry.entryTitle: What is XML Schema? What led to the development of schemas?
entry.paragraph:
Schemas use use XML syntax not EBNF grammar
Schemas were developed in conjunction with the W3C to standardize validation of XML documents.
XML Schema documents can specify what type of data (e.g., numeric, text) an element can contain
Two categories of types exist in XML Schema: simple types and complex types.

entry.entryTitle: What are the main advantages of XML Schema over DTDs?
entry.paragraph:
XML schema's use XML-based syntax
Are more verbose than DTD's which make them easier to comprehend.
Schema allows you to create and use custom data types.
